scenes.action_text: CORIOLANUS Written by William Shakespeare Screenplay by John Logan INT. DARKENED ROOM - DAY The blade of a knife. Pulled from its sheath, intricate tribal etchings on the blade catching the light. The blade being pulled across a sharpening stone. Swoosh- swoosh-swoosh. Rhythmic. A well-practiced hand. A muscular, tattooed arm. The blade held up. Razor sharp. The glow of a TV in the darkened room is the only illumination. We see images on
